<acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:User> <acr2:AlertEmailList xsi:nil="true"/> <acr2:InvoiceOption>4</acr2:InvoiceOption> <acr2:IsLockedOut>false</acr2:IsLockedOut> <acr2:Name>Test User</acr2:Name> <acr2:ParameterList> <acr2:MerchantUserParameter> <acr2:Name>Zip Code</acr2:Name> con:request.name: GetUser

<acr2:CellPhoneNumber/> <acr2:Department>est</acr2:Department> <acr2:Email>username@domain.tld</acr2:Email> <acr2:HeadCashier xsi:nil="true"/> con:request.name: GetUser (Modified)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetUser>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:UserIdToRetrieve>${AddUser#Request#declare namespace acr2='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common'; declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests'; //tem:AddUser[1]/tem:request[1]/acr1:User[1]/acr2:UserId[1]}</acr1:UserIdToRetrieve>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetUser>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteUser
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:DeleteUser> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:UserIdToDelete>${AddUser#Request#declare namespace acr2='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common'; declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests'; //tem:AddUser[1]/tem:request[1]/acr1:User[1]/acr2:UserId[1]}</acr1:UserIdToDelete> </tem:request> </tem:DeleteUser> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
